title: Short, Sweet, and Riot to the point. (See what i did there ;D )
body:
So i think Mord needs a visual update due to the fact his feet are the size of small boats and his body is unporpational{{champion:82}} .
Short Sweet and Right to the Point.

But Riot has said they are going to rework him (NOOOOOO) and he will probably get a VU then.
